name: My Pills!
description:
My pills is a fast-paced game where you will need to manage customer's requests at an oddly large pharmacy.

How to Play:

  1. Locate on the lower right corner the customer request.
  2. Go to the right pharmacy area (Delivery or Crafting)
  3. Fulfill the request 
  4. Run to deliver it at the front desk
  5. Win easy money before you lose it all!

Controls:

  • WASD to mode
  • Shift to sprint
  • Press E to interact with scene items
